headline.main: DON PORT RETAKEN; Soviet Reports Germans in Retreat After Loss of Five Divisions

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Sunday, Nov. 30--The recapture of Rostov and the routing of Col. Gen. Paul Ludwig von Kleist's forces, which had been holding the city for almost seven days, were reported in a Russian High Command communique last night.
abstract: USSR forces rout Germans at Rostov; retake city; Stalin congratulates troops; USSR forces continue Donets basin advance; London hails victory; map
snippet: BERNE, Switzerland, Sunday, Nov. 30--The recapture of Rostov and the routing of Col. Gen. Paul Ludwig von Kleist's forces, which had been holding the city for almost seven days, were reported in a Russian High Command communique last night....
